name: Easy Pork Chop Casserole
author: SHECOOKS2
summary: This is delicious and easy to prepare. Serve with rice. You can also try baking it with other vegetables, or potatoes.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, combine the mushroom soup, onion soup mix, water and mushrooms
In a large skillet over medium-high heat, brown the pork chops on each side
Transfer chops to a 9x9 inch baking dish, and cover with the mushroom soup mixture
Bake in the preheated oven for 1 1/2 hours, or until internal pork temperature reaches 145 degrees F (63 degrees C)
